body_html:
Theano offers serveral 3D Convolutional Implementations on CUDA. https://github.com/Theano/Theano/blob/master/theano/sandbox/cuda/GpuConv3D.py
https://github.com/Theano/Theano/blob/master/theano/sandbox/cuda/GpuConvGrad3D.py
https://github.com/Theano/Theano/blob/master/theano/sandbox/cuda/fftconv.py
I would really appreciate, if you guys can port this stuff to tensorflow.

body:
Theano offers serveral 3D Convolutional Implementations on CUDA. https://github.com/Theano/Theano/blob/master/theano/sandbox/cuda/GpuConv3D.py
https://github.com/Theano/Theano/blob/master/theano/sandbox/cuda/GpuConvGrad3D.py
https://github.com/Theano/Theano/blob/master/theano/sandbox/cuda/fftconv.py 
I would really appreciate, if you guys can port this stuff to tensorflow.
